EmailTemplate.subject: Join Our Webinar: How Data Science Drives Personalized Healthcare
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Personalized experiences using data science deliver positive health outcomes, lower costs, and help people thrive.
Register for our Webinar: Please reply to this email for details
How Data Science Drives Personalized Healthcare
A Discussion with Dr. Jenny Schneider, Chief Medical Officer at Livongo
June 12th, 11:30am PDT
How amazing would it be if each personâ€™s healthcare experience could be personalized to exactly what they need when they need it to optimize their health?
Using machine learning and data science, Livongo clusters data to understand behaviors and personalize our member experience.
Hear Dr. Jennifer Schneider discuss how data science insights can be leveraged to drive behavior change.
WEBINAR DETAILS:
Host: Dr. Jennifer Schneider, MD, MS, Chief Medical Officer, Livongo
Date: Tuesday, June 12, 2018
Time: 11:30 AM - 12PM PST
Can't make it? Register anyway and you'll receive a link to the recording when it's available.
